name: The Legend of Myra
storyline: Humanity tries to exterminate all rabbits. And obviously the best way to do this is by storing all cabbages underground so that they can't reach them.
summary: In The Legend of Myra, humanity tries to exterminate all rabbits. And obviously the best way to do this is by storing all cabbages underground so that they can't reach them. The player takes control over the rabbit Myra who has to try just that.
